committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill entitled "the National Peace Garden Reauthorization Act".

summary.text: Extends the authorization of the National Peace Garden to establish a Peace Garden in the District of Columbia to June 30, 1997. Deems any reference in a record of the United States to the Peace Garden Project, Inc., to be a reference to the National Peace Garden.

titles.title: A bill entitled "the National Peace Garden Reauthorization Act".
